data.prayer: Please, teach the 28,243 believers in Kashgar, Xinjiang Uygur, China how to pray to you and how to listen for your voice. That they might follow you into the good works you have prepared for them.
data.verse: My sheep listen to my voice; I know them, and they follow me.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Kashgar, Xinjiang Uygur, China

data.prayer: Father, knowing that teachers will be judged more strictly, help the local leaders in Kashgar, Xinjiang Uygur, China to be careful with their words.
data.verse: Not many of you should become teachers, my brothers, for you know that we who teach will be judged with greater strictness.

data.prayer: Father, please give the people in the county of Kashgar access to a Bible in their own language.
God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Kashgar, Xinjiang Uygur, China.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Akto Turkmen people might believe through him.
Father, let the threatened of Kashgar, Xinjiang Uygur, China know that it is better to trust in you than to trust in humans.
data.verse: It is better to take refuge in the Lord than to trust in humans.

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the county of Kashgar, Xinjiang Uygur, China.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.section_summary:
the county of Kashgar, Xinjiang Uygur, China has a population of 372,300.

We estimate Kashgar has 28,243 people who might know Jesus, 6,014 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 338,042 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Kashgar, Xinjiang Uygur, China. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.
